mfa.backup_key_desc: Use this backup key if you're unable to access your authenticator app or if the generated 2FA code doesn't work

social_account.no_social_acc_desc: Uh-oh! No social networks connected. Link your connections and collect more content!

upgrad_plan.heading: Oops!
upgrad_plan.message: Upgrade your plan to start using #{{company_name}} collaboratively with your teams

collab.title: Collaborator panel
collab.no_collab_desc: You can start adding new collaborators here.
collab.admin_desc: The Admin role enjoys full access to the #{{company}}, allowing them to perform all functionalities and allowing them to add other managers.
collab.manager_desc: The Manager role, in contrast, has limited access to the #{{company}} and its functionalities. Their access is determined by the permissions they have been granted.
collab.content_gallery_desc: Collect posts from your preferred social channels in a curated content gallery. Moderate and modify the content, turn it shoppable and request rights directly from #{{company}} to leverage it on your marketing touchpoints.
collab.product_catalog_desc: It is a list of products you can sync across platforms (Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento), including essential details like descriptions, images, and pricing to help customers make purchasing decisions.
collab.publish_touch_desc: Seamlessly publish your curated assets, such as shoppable UGC galleries, and shop the looks on websites, product pages, email campaigns, and within social bios with Shopon.bio.
collab.network_manager_desc: The Network manager, accessible via your My profile tab, enables you to explore Social Accounts. You can add up to 5 social networks to expand your professional network.
collab.additional_features_desc: Additional features include Style Studio for branding, Auto-Moderation, and Creators and Insights for content management. For a comprehensive suite of tools, you'll also find All Access, Apps and More, and Analytics.
collab.desc_create: Create a password for accessing the collaborator.

pricing.auto_update_desc: Update time means how fast the new content will be updated automatically on your Social feeds.
pricing.api_limit: Due to API limitations, LinkedIn feeds may take up to 48 hours to update, while Twitter feeds will refresh every 4-6 hours
pricing.free_plan_txt: We also offer a Free Forever Plan with limited features.
pricing.twitter_feed_desc: Top-up Your Twitter Feed By Purchasing An Add On
pricing.all_other_feeds_desc: Top-Up Your Feed By Purchasing An Add On
pricing.tailored_plan_desc: Custom plans designed for your enterprise's unique needs. Personalized customization, scalable options, dedicated support, seamless integration, and growth-focused solutions to drive success.

pricing.payment_fail_desc: It seems we couldn't process your payment automatically. Additional action is required to complete the payment.

pricing.share_link_desc_by_email: Want to receive the payment link via email?
pricing.level_up: Level up your website with more features!
pricing.downgrade_msg: Are you sure you want to downgrade?
pricing.pending_msg: Your payment is still pending for '#{{planName}}'

pricing.no_changed_des: No, I have changed my mind

moderation.create_gallery: Create a Gallery, to add feed! ‚åõ
moderation.deleted_gallery_desc: Oops! Looks like you have deleted your gallery, create one by simply clicking on the button below.
moderation.no_feed_desc: It looks like you haven‚Äôt added any feed yet. Connect your preferred platform to start displaying content.
moderation.meta_limit_desc: Only upcoming mentions from Instagram will appear here. Existing posts cannot be retrieved due to Meta guidelines.
moderation.no_posts_avail_desc: There are currently no posts available from your connected sources. New content will appear here once published. You can also add another feed to display more content.
moderation.private_posts_desc: Switch some posts to public or create another feed to see more.
moderation.no_posts_yet_desc: Looks like there‚Äôs nothing to see here yet. Moderate posts which you don't want to display!
moderation.ugc_right_error: You do not have access to UGC Rights as per your current plan. Please upgrade your plan to unlock this feature.
moderation.ugc_right_error_2: To send UGC Rights request in bulk, make sure you choose posts from a single user.
moderation.modal_pending_oops: Oops! Your UGC Request is pending now
moderation.steps_1: You have successfully generated a "UGC Request" for this post.
moderation.steps_2: Quickly review your Request before sending it to the owner.
moderation.steps_3: Click on the "Raise Request" button located in the right bottom corner of the screen and then you will be redirected to the user's original post.
moderation.steps_4: Paste the link of "UGC Request" in the comments section of the original post.
moderation.steps_5: You will get UGC Rights asap post owner accept your request and allow you to use their post.
moderation.modal_rejected_oops: Sorry! Your UGC Request has been rejected
moderation.guideline_2: Be clear about your intentions with the post
moderation.mode_title: Select the mode for Right Request
moderation.mode_desc: #{{company}} offers two distinct modes to request rights. Comment Request and DM Request.
moderation.mode_comment_desc: Request creators consent as a comment on their post.
moderation.mode_dm_desc: Send a Rights request directly into the DM of the creators!
moderation.step_1: You have successfully generated a "UGC Request" for this post.
moderation.step_2: Quickly review your Request before sending it to the owner.
moderation.step_3: Click on the "Raise Request" button located in the right bottom corner of the screen and then you will be redirected to the user's original post.
moderation.step_4: Paste the link of "UGC Request" in the comments section of the original post.
moderation.step_5: You will get UGC Rights asap post owner accept your request and allow you to use their post.
moderation.copy_msg: #{{custom_msg}} Just reply with ##{{hash}} if you're up for it, and you can find all the nitty-gritty details in our bio. Thanks a bunch!
moderation.msg_default: We loved your creative brilliance! Can we showcase your incredible work and give you the recognition you deserve? ‚ú®üì∏üôå. Please approve our request so we can use your content in our marketing campaign.
moderation.tnc_click: Click on Generate Request to proceed to next step.
moderation.ph_search_products: Search Products By name, category, SKU, tags
moderation.ai_banner: Get rid of manual product tagging with AI
moderation.error_url: Button URL must contain a valid URL (e.g. https://google.com)

moderation.connect_acc_msg: Please make sure to connect the correct source account.
moderation.require_ph: Please mention any specific requirements/terms for approval/rejection. (optional)‚Ä¶.

cancel_plan.cancel_heading: Please let us know the reason you want to cancel your #{{company_name}} Subscription.
cancel_plan.cancel_back: I've changed my mind, Go Back
cancel_plan.cancel_feedback_intro: We appreciate your feedback. May we ask which alternative you found more suitable? Your insights helps us improve!
cancel_plan.offer_info: We understand cost is important and we want to ensure that our services are beneficial for all our customer's journeys.
cancel_plan.offer_text: Hence, we would like to offer you an exclusive 10% discount on your next billing cycle. Claim Now!
cancel_plan.issue_prompt: Could you specify the issue you are experiencing with #{{companyName}}?
cancel_plan.issue_alert: Apologies for any inconvenience! We want to ensure a smooth experience. Could you share more details about the technical issues you've encountered? Our team is here to assist.
technical_issues: Got concerns regarding security and compliance.
cancel_plan.call_prompt: We understand that ease of use is crucial. Would you like to book a free call with our experts who will guide you through the setup and handle all your queries?
cancel_plan.tech_alert: Apologies for any inconvenience! We want to ensure a smooth experience. Could you share more details about the technical issues you've encountered? Our team is here to assist.
cancel_plan.other_feedback_prompt: Please let us know the issues so that we can try and resolve it to our best capabilities.

feedback_response.heading: Thank you for letting us know.
feedback_response.text: Your cancellation has been processed successfully. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out.

feedback_response.heading: We're sorry to see you go.
feedback_response.text: Your cancellation has been processed successfully. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out.

feedback_response.heading: Your effective price will be
feedback_response.text: Great! Your discount is now active. You will be charged 10% less on your next billing date.

auto_pilot.title: Auto Pilot
auto_pilot.msg: Select the social platform from which you want to add the feeds
auto_pilot.here_all: Here's all that you can do
auto_pilot.ai_note: Note*: AI-driven rules may take some time to activate. During this period, affected posts will be temporarily moved to a private tab. Once activated, the rules will adhere to the established guidelines.

upgrade_popup.title: Auto Pilot
upgrade_popup.dics: Want to create impressive widgets without spending hours? Auto-pilot is just the feature you need to sieve all the irrelevant posts within minutes! ‚ö° Ready to explore? Upgrade your plan.

default_rules.title: Bye-bye Duplicates
default_rules.text: Enable this AI-powered rule to automatically identify and remove duplicate posts using the TruSense AI Duplicate Detection feature. All detected duplicates will be made private, ensuring a cleaner and more organized experience.

default_rules.title: Negativity Neutralizer
default_rules.text: Activate this AI rule to detect posts with negative sentiment and automatically make them private, keeping your feed focused and positive.

default_rules.title: AI Content Spotlight
default_rules.text: Activate this rule to automatically make posts with high AI recommendation scores public, showcasing your best-performing content.

rule_steps.title: Select The Trigger:
rule_steps.text: Select the Trigger on which you want to perform an action. Such as feed, network, hashtag.

rule_steps.title: Choose an Action
rule_steps.text: Select the action you want to execute based on your chosen trigger. For example, public, private, or delete.

manage_feed.empty_gallery_title: Create a Gallery, to add feed! ‚åõ
manage_feed.empty_gallery_desc: Oops! Looks like you have deleted your gallery, create one by simply clicking on the button below.
manage_feed.disable_status: Disabling this status will hide all collected posts from this feed, affecting visibility and content access.
manage_feed.enable_moderation: Enabling moderation will make all newly received posts private until they are reviewed and approved.
manage_feed.tooltip_disconnect: Feed disconnected as the social media account's user name got changed since your last connection with #{{company}}. Kindly click on the button below to connect.

no_page_found.title: No Trespassing! üëÄ
no_page_found.desc: Looks like you don‚Äôt have access to this page.

manual_upload.page_desc: Upload content directly to the feed via device or by adding a post URL from Instagram or TikTok
manual_upload.alert_desc_pro_tip: Upload content directly to the feed by adding a post URL.
manual_upload.media_size: Video size: Max 100MB | Image size: Max 50 MB

upgrade_plan.modal_title: Access #{{network_name}} Content with Our Paid Plan! üéØ
upgrade_plan.modal_desc: You're trying to connect #{{network_name}}, a premium source available in our Paid Plan. Unlock it to boost engagement and add a fresh dynamic to your site!

snapup.downlod_desc: You can download User details, such as Names, Email addresses, and Image URLs, directly from the Review Hub Collection.
snapup.moderation_label: Manually approve posts before making them public.
snapup.collect_desc1: Feel free to share this URL with your audience, enabling them to upload visual user-generated content (UGC) and reviews.
snapup.collect_desc2: Get creative with the UGC on your marketing touchpoints to delight your audience.
snapup.share_desc: Easily share this URL across multiple platforms like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or email to engage your audience with visual user-generated content (UGC) and reviews.
snapup.qr_desc: Easily download this QR code or copy the embed code to share it on your platforms.
snapup.embed_desc: Share this embed code with your team. Enter the email Id to send the code directly to them.

1.title: You've Reached your Product Tag Limit
1.desc: Don't let your revenue slip away‚Äîupgrade now to unlock more product tags and continue driving conversions.
1.accordionDesc: You can un-tag some products to continue using under the plan limits.

2.title: You've Hit a Limit on Your Free Plan
2.desc: You've added a feed from a network that isn't included in your current plan. To continue displaying content from this network, please upgrade your plan.
2.accordionDesc: You can delete the feed(s) from unsupported networks to continue using under the free plan limits.

3.title: You've Exceeded Your Plan's Feed Limit
3.desc: You've added #{{added}}, but your current plan allows only #{{allowed}}. To keep using Taggbox without interruptions, please upgrade your plan.
3.accordionDesc: To stay within your plan's limits, you can remove the extra feed(s) below.

4.title: Post limit reached - Gallery Paused
4.desc: No new posts will be fetched, and your gallery won't update with fresh content. To continue displaying content from this network, please upgrade your plan.
4.accordionDesc: You can remove some posts from your gallery to continue using under the free plan limits.

5.title: View limit reached - Gallery Paused

alert_msg.26: Instagram only allows posts from the last 24 hours. If there are no recent posts in the 24-hour duration, then the top 50 posts will be aggregated. Also, all your upcoming posts will be aggregated. Posts collected via hashtags will not include any information of the user.
alert_msg.34: Initially stories from the last 24 hours will be shown after which all the upcoming stories will be aggregated.
alert_msg.24: You will only get upcoming posts after creating mentions feed.
alert_msg.25: Initially the latest 32 tagged posts on Instagram will be aggregated after which all the upcoming tagged posts will be aggregated.
alert_msg.66: Initially 25 videos will be aggregated through handle after which all the upcoming videos will be aggregated.
alert_msg.1_default: Initially 32 posts uploaded on personal accounts will be aggregated after which all the upcoming posts will be aggregated.
alert_msg.1_twitter: Initially the latest 100 posts on the Twitter handle will be aggregated after which all the upcoming posts will be aggregated.
alert_msg.2_default: Initially hashtag posts from the last 30 days will be aggregated after which all the upcoming posts will be aggregated.
alert_msg.7: Initially mentions of the last 7 days will be aggregated after which all the upcoming mentions will be aggregated.
alert_msg.28_special: Initially 20 posts uploaded on accounts will be aggregated after which all the upcoming posts will be aggregated.
alert_msg.33: Initially the latest 5 user reviews of Place will be aggregated after which all the upcoming reviews will be aggregated.
alert_msg.29: Initially latest 50 user reviews will be aggregated after which all the upcoming reviews will be aggregated.
alert_msg.71: Initially 32 posts will be aggregated through handle after which all the upcoming posts will be aggregated.
alert_msg.73: You will only get upcoming posts after creating mentions feed.

twitter_advance.instruction: Use the table below to construct your query.
twitter_advance.target_keywords_6: containing "service" and with a positive attitude.
twitter_advance.target_keywords_7: containing "service" and with a negative attitude.
twitter_advance.target_location: containing hashtag "#dogs" within Los Angeles Get coordinates (10km radius)
twitter_advance.target_content: containing " funny" and with a URL.
twitter_advance.target_dates_1: containing " champion" and sent since date "2012-12-24" (year-month-day).
twitter_advance.target_dates_2: containing " champion" and sent before the date "2012-12-24".

omnisend.text: Start by logging in to your

omnisend.afterText2: button > choose to create the email campaign

Now select the email campaign template
From the content tab choose HTML and paste the generated UGC campaign code.

hubspot.text: From the drag and drop tab, choose a template based on the type of email you want to create
To add UGC to your template, click and drag a HTML element from the Content tab in the left panel directly into the email editor
Now, paste the generated UGC email campaign code
Lastly, apply the required changes and Voila! You will have successfully added the UGC campaign on email

active.text: Next, choose a list and create a segment
Now, select a template for your campaign
Customize your campaign. Drag and drop HTML block, and paste the generated UGC Campaign code
Lastly, review the Campaign Summary page and send your email

Now design your email by choosing the template
Add HTML from the content block and paste the copied UGC campaign code here

getresponse.text: Provide an internal name for your message and select your linked list.
Start designing your message by clicking on

Save the message as draft or Click Send message/Schedule.

other.text: Simply login to your email marketing platform and select the template where you wish to showcase UGC campaign.
Paste the generated code at the preferred location on the email template.
Apply the required changes and Voila! You will have successfully added the UGC campaign on email.

rattingSchema.rattingInfo: This is how your brand looks like in SERP

sideBar.1: Steps to add Rating Schema on your Website
sideBar.2: Copy and paste the schema code on your page head section.
sideBar.3: Go to your Google console and re-crawl the website URL.
sideBar.4: Display Star Rating in Search Results
sideBar.5: A Rating Schema in SERP refers to the structured data markup that helps search engines display star ratings and reviews in search results.
sideBar.6: Increases Click-Through Rate (CTR) - Star ratings and review snippets make your search listing stand out, potentially boosting CTR by up to 30%.
sideBar.7: Builds Trust & Credibility - Users trust pages with verified ratings, making them more likely to click and convert.
sideBar.8: Boosts Local SEO - Ratings for businesses improve local search rankings and attract more customers.

more_publish.title: Buffer
more_publish.text: Connect with Buffer to seamlessly schedule and post user-generated content (UGC) across your social media platforms. Build trust and engage your audience with authentic content.

more_publish.title: Hubspot
more_publish.text: Enrich your email campaigns by featuring UGC through HubSpot. Showcase customer reviews and authentic content to boost trust and enhance conversions.

more_publish.title: Hootsuite
more_publish.text: Plan and post user-generated content effortlessly with Hootsuite. Elevate your brand‚Äôs presence by maintaining a consistent and trustworthy voice on social media.

more_publish.title: Zapier
more_publish.text: Automate workflows and connect with thousands of apps using Zapier. Repurpose UGC with ease and integrate it into your existing tools and processes seamlessly.

more_publish.title: Facebook Ads
more_publish.text: Enhance your ad campaigns on Facebook with engaging UGC. Boost performance and connect with your audience authentically. Got ideas? We‚Äôre ready to listen!

more_publish.title: Tiktok Ads
more_publish.text: Create captivating TikTok Ads by integrating user-generated content. Deliver ads that stand out and engage your audience effectively. Have feedback? Share it with us‚Äîwe value your input!

more_publish.title: Request an Integration
more_publish.text: Looking for an integration that‚Äôs not here? Let us know your requirements, and we‚Äôll explore how we can make it happen to suit your needs.
